description: Need an afternoon pick-me-up? Try this chicken sausage roll recipe made with soft flour tortillas. You only need 5 minutes to prepare this speedy snack.
name: Cheat’s Sausage Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fanforced. Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Brush 1 side of 1 tortilla with egg. Place 2 chicken tenderloins, thin ends facing into the centre, just below centre of tortilla. Roll to enclose chicken. Repeat with remaining tortillas, chicken and a little egg.

Brush tops with remaining egg and sprinkle with seeds. Using a small, sharp knife, score tops, then cut each roll digionally into 4 pieces. Place, seamside down, on tray. Bake for 20 minutes or until rolls are golden and chicken is cooked through.
Serve sausage rolls with tomato chutney and leafy mix.
